member.name: IDeskBand.GetBandInfo

summary.para: Gets state information for a band object.
summary.div: Important You should use thumbnail toolbars in new development in place of desk bands, which are not supported as of Windows 7.

member.param: The identifier of the band, assigned by the container. The band object can retain this value if it is required.

param.name: dwViewMode
param.para: The view mode of the band object. One of the following values:
The band object is being displayed in a horizontal band.
The band object is being displayed in a vertical band.
The band object is being displayed in a floating band.
The band object is being displayed in a transparent band.

member.param: Pointer to a structure that receives the band information for the object. The dwMask member of this structure indicates the specific information that is being requested.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Used to obtain information about a band object.
summary.div: Important You should use thumbnail toolbars in new development in place of desk bands, which are not supported as of Windows 7.
